# awscc_networkmanager_core_network_prefix_list_association (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::NetworkManager::CoreNetworkPrefixListAssociation



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

### Read-Only

- `core_network_id` (String) The ID of the core network.
- `prefix_list_alias` (String) The alias of the prefix list
- `prefix_list_arn` (String) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the prefix list.
